QuestData.Title: Into the Maw
QuestData.Description:
I have not seen Tyrande since she departed for Icecrown... but I see her in my dreams. She stalks a nightmarish landscape, brimming with the might of the Night Warrior.
Such power is too much for any mortal to bear for long. I shudder to think of the toll it has taken on my minn'do.
Highlord Fordragon has told me of the Maw. If you truly have braved its horrors before, then I ask that you guide me through them as well.
We must find Tyrande and convince her to let go of the Night Warrior's rage.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Shandris Feathermoon into the Maw.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Shandris Feathermoon within the Maw.
QuestData.RewardText:
I have seen bits and pieces of this dark realm in my dreams. Tyrande roams this place.
We must find her.

Objectives.Objective: Shandris Feathermoon escorted into the Maw
